                def extract_token
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Try multiple token sources for flexibility
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  token = request.params["token"] ||
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                          request.headers["Authorization"]&.split&.last ||
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                          request.headers["X-Auth-Token"] ||
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                          request.headers["X-API-Token"]
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Clean up token (remove Bearer prefix if present)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  token&.gsub(/^Bearer\s+/i, "")
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87.

    88. 
            

            
              
            

                def decode_jwt_token(token)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  JWT.decode(
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    token,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.application.credentials.secret_key_base,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    true,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                    { algorithm: "HS256" }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  ).first
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue JWT::ExpiredSignature
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_connection_rejected("Token signature expired")
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue JWT::InvalidIssuerError
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_connection_rejected("Invalid token issuer")
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue JWT::InvalidAudienceError
          
      102.

                  log_connection_rejected("Invalid token audience")
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue JWT::InvalidIatError
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_connection_rejected("Invalid token issued at")
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil

    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil

                def token_expired?(payload)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  return false unless payload["exp"]

    117. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  payload["exp"] < Time.current.to_i
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121.

                def token_blacklisted?(token)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if token is in the JWT denylist
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  return false unless defined?(JwtDenylist)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  JwtDenylist.exists?(jti: extract_jti_from_token(token))

      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128.

                def extract_jti_from_token(token)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract JTI from token without full decode for performance
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    decoded = JWT.decode(token, nil, false)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    decoded.first["jti"]
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                    nil
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                def user_active?(user)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add any additional user validation logic here
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.present? && !user.respond_to?(:active?) || user.active?

                end

                def log_connection_established

                def log_connection_authorized(user)

                def log_connection_rejected(reason)

                  Rails.logger.warn "[WebSocket] Connection rejected: #{reason} from #{request.remote_ip}"
          
      157.

            class ListChannel < ApplicationCable::Channel
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def subscribed
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @list = find_authorized_list
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                return if performed? # Early return if error was handled
          
      7.

              # Handle incoming messages from clients
          
      17.

              def receive(data)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                log_message_received(data)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                case data["action"]
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                when "ping"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  transmit({ type: "pong", timestamp: Time.current.iso8601 })
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                when "typing"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_typing_indicator(data)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                when "presence"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  handle_presence_update(data)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_unknown_action(data["action"])
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  transmit({ type: "error", message: "Unknown action" })
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      32.

              private
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35.

              def find_authorized_list
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                list_id = params[:list_id]
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                if list_id.blank?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_subscription_rejected("No list_id provided")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  reject_subscription("List ID is required")
          
      41.

              def can_access_list?(list)

                return false unless list.present?

                  def normalize_email(email)

                  def serialize(rel)

    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    # If you have a serializer, prefer that; otherwise inline:

                  else: 4

    140.

                  then: 15
                
              
                
                  else: 2

                  def valid_cursor_format?(cursor)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return false if cursor.blank?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                      raw = Base64.urlsafe_decode64(cursor)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                      parts = raw.split(":", 2)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      return false unless parts.length == 2
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Validate date format
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                      Date.iso8601(parts[0])
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Validate ID format (should be numeric)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                      Integer(parts[1])
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                      true
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ArgumentError, TypeError
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                      false
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      140.

                  # ---------- keyset cursor helpers ----------
          
      142.

              1
            

            
              
            

                  def encode_cursor(date, id)
          
      143.

                  def decode_cursor(cur)

      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186.

                  then: 0

    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188.

      201.

      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :validate_share_params, only: %i[create update update_permissions]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  before_action -> { validate_pagination_params(valid_order_fields: %w[created_at email role status invited_at]) }, only: [ :index ]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:list_id/shares
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def index
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      shares = build_shares_query
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check if pagination is requested
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      if params[:page].present? || params[:per_page].present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                        result = apply_pagination(shares, default_per_page: 25, max_per_page: 50)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                          shares: result[:paginated_query].map { |share| ListShareSerializer.new(share).as_json },
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                          pagination: result[:pagination_metadata]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                        # Return simple array for backward compatibility
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                        render json: shares.map { |share| ListShareSerializer.new(share).as_json }
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "ListSharesController#index error: #{e.message}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to retrieve shares" } },
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37.

                  def create
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              21
            

            
              
            

                      service = ListShareCreationService.new(list: @list, current_user: current_user)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              21
            

            
              
            

                      result = service.create!(
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                        email: params[:email],
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                        role: params[:role],
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                        permissions: share_params
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
              16
            

            
              
                
                  then: 15
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                      status = result[:created] ? :created : :ok
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                      render json: ListShareSerializer.new(result[:share]).as_json, status: status
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ListShareCreationService::BadRequestError => e
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :bad_request
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ListShareCreationService::ValidationError => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: e.message, details: e.details } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Create share failed: #{e.class}: #{e.message}"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to create share" } },
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      70.

                    end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71.

                  def update
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      if @list_share.update(share_params)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: ListShareSerializer.new(@list_share).as_json
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Share update validation failed: #{@list_share.errors.full_messages}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: @list_share.errors.as_json } },
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :unprocessable_content
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

      84.

                      Rails.logger.error "Share update failed: #{e.message}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to update share" } },
          
      86.

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      87.

                    begin

      95.

                      else

      97.

                    begin

              4
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content

    112.

                  def accept
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                      service = ListShareAcceptanceService.new(list_share: @list_share, current_user: current_user)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                      list_share = service.accept!(invitation_token: params[:invitation_token])
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                      render json: ListShareSerializer.new(list_share).as_json, status: :ok
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ListShareAcceptanceService::ValidationError => e
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      128.

      129.

                  def decline
          
      136.

                    begin
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                      service = ListShareDeclineService.new(list_share: @list_share)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                      service.decline!
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { message: "Invitation declined" }
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ListShareDeclineService::ValidationError => e
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      143.

      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to decline invitation" } },
          
      145.

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146.

      147.

                  # POST /api/v1/list_shares/accept

                  # Public endpoint for accepting invitations via email link (no authentication required)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def accept_invitation
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                      ListShareAcceptanceService.accept_by_token!(token: params[:token])
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ListShareAcceptanceService::ValidationError => e
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :bad_request
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ListShareAcceptanceService::NotFoundError => e
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :not_found
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "Accept invitation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to accept invitation" } },
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              52
            

            
              
            

                    @list = List.find(params[:list_id])
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list_share
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              27
            

            
              
            

                    @list_share = @list.list_shares.find(params[:id])
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_user
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              36
            

            
              
                
                  else: 32
                
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
            

                    unless @list.user == current_user
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Only list user can manage shares" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_share_access
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                    return if @list.viewable_by?(current_user) || @list_share.user == current_user
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Unauthorized" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186.

                      can_edit: params[:can_edit],

      90.

                  def validation_error!(record)
          
      247.

                    render json: { errors: record.errors.as_json },
          
      248.

      249.

      250.

    251. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def validation_error_message!(msg)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: { base: [ msg ] } } },
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                           status: :unprocessable_content
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255.

    0.0% lines covered

              module V1

                class MembershipsController < ApplicationController

                  def create

                    # Find user by email or ID
          
      54.

    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56.

      57.

      58.

      59.

      62.

      63.

      64.

      66.

      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67.

      68.

                  def set_membership
          
      132.

      134.

                  def membership_params
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Only permit user_identifier, handle role separately for security
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted = params.require(:membership).permit(:user_identifier)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle role separately with explicit validation
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:membership][:role].present?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      role = params[:membership][:role].to_s.downcase
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      if %w[editor viewer].include?(role)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                        permitted[:role] = role
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                        permitted[:role] = "viewer" # Default to viewer for invalid roles
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                      permitted[:role] = "viewer" # Default role
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  def find_user_by_email_or_id(identifier)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Try to find by ID first (if it's a number)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    if identifier.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                      User.find_by(id: identifier)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Otherwise, try to find by email
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      User.find_by(email: identifier)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      166.

                class NotificationsController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  before_action :validate_page_params, only: [ :index ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/notifications
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                      logs = build_notifications_query
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Apply pagination at database level
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                      page = [ params[:page].to_i, 1 ].max
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                      per_page = per_page_limit
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                      offset = (page - 1) * per_page
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                      paginated_logs = logs.limit(per_page).offset(offset)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                      render json: paginated_logs.map { |notification|
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
              78
            

            
              
            

                        NotificationSerializer.new(notification).as_json
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Failed to retrieve notifications" } },
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :internal_server_error
          
      24.

                    end
          
      25.

                  end

                  # PATCH /api/v1/notifications/:id/mark_read
          
      28.

              1
            

            
              
            

                  def mark_read
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
              11
            

            
              
            

                      notification = current_user.notification_logs.find(params[:id])
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                      notification.mark_read!
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                      head :no_content

                  def parse_read_filter(value)

    78. 
            
              2

    79. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1

      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              1

                  # GET /api/v1/recurring_templates/:id/instances
          
      81.

              1
            

            
              
            

                  def instances
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
            

                    return not_found unless @template
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                    instances = Task.where(recurring_template_id: @template.id).order(due_at: :desc)   # spec expects ordering by due_at descending
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                    render json: instances.map { |i| serialize_instance(i) }, status: :ok
          
      85.

      86.

                  def build_templates_query

                  def base_scope
          
      97.

                      .joins(:list)

      100.

                  def find_authorized_list(list_id)

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

                  def prepare_template_attributes(attrs)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    attrs[:note] = attrs.delete(:description) if attrs.key?(:description)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:is_recurring] = true
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:recurring_template_id] = nil
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:strict_mode] ||= false
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                    # due_at is required by the model; seed it if missing
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs[:due_at] ||= begin
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      if attrs[:recurrence_time].present?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                        t = Time.zone.parse(attrs[:recurrence_time].to_s) rescue nil
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        if t
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                          (Time.zone.today.to_time + t.seconds_since_midnight)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        else
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                          Time.current
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      else
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                        Time.current
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if attrs.key?(:recurrence_days)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      days = Array(attrs[:recurrence_days])
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Convert day names to numbers if needed
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                      day_map = { "sunday" => 0, "monday" => 1, "tuesday" => 2, "wednesday" => 3, "thursday" => 4, "friday" => 5, "saturday" => 6 }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                      attrs[:recurrence_days] = days.map { |day| day_map[day.to_s.downcase] || day.to_i }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_params
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get the params hash (either nested or flat)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              31
            

            
              
            

                    param_source = params[:recurring_template] || params
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate recurrence_time format if present
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
              31
            

            
              
                
                  then: 27
                
              
                
                  else: 4
                
              
            

                    if param_source[:recurrence_time].present?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              27
            

            
              
            

                      time_str = param_source[:recurrence_time].to_s
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              27
            

            
              
                
                  else: 23
                
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
            

                      unless time_str.match?(/\A([01]?[0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]\z/)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                        render json: {
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                          error: {
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                            message: "Validation failed",
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                            details: { recurrence_time: [ "must be in HH:MM format" ] }
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                        return
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate recurrence_days if present
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              27
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 26
                
              
            

                    if param_source[:recurrence_days].present?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      days = Array(param_source[:recurrence_days])
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      valid_days = (0..6).to_a
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      day_map = { "sunday" => 0, "monday" => 1, "tuesday" => 2, "wednesday" => 3, "thursday" => 4, "friday" => 5, "saturday" => 6 }
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      days.each do |day|
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                        day_value = day_map[day.to_s.downcase] || day.to_i
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        unless valid_days.include?(day_value)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                          render json: {
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                            error: {
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                              message: "Validation failed",
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                              details: { recurrence_days: [ "must be valid day values (0-6 or day names)" ] }
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                            }
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                          }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                          return
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate list_id if present
          
      197.

                  then: 21

                    if params[:list_id].present?
          
      198.

      199.

                        render json: {
          
      200.

      203.

      204.

                        }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      205.

                        nil

                  def template_params
          
      212.

                    # Handle both flat params and nested recurring_template params
          
      213.

              26

                    if params[:recurring_template].present?
          
      214.

                      params.require(:recurring_template).permit(
          
      215.

                        :title, :note, :description,

      223.

                    else

              1
            

            
              
            

                      params.permit(
          
      226.

      227.

                  def serialize_template(t, include_instances: false)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload = {
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
              15
            

            
              
            

                      id: t.id,
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                      list_id: t.list_id,
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: t.title,
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                      note: t.note,
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                      is_recurring: t.is_recurring?,
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                      recurrence_pattern: t.recurrence_pattern,
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                      recurrence_interval: t.recurrence_interval,
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                      recurrence_days: t.recurrence_days,
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 15
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      recurrence_time: t.recurrence_time&.strftime("%H:%M"),
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                      recurrence_end_date: t.recurrence_end_date,

      164.
