      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service = TaskReassignmentService.new(task: @task, user: current_user)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service.reassign!(assigned_to_id: assigned_to_id)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue TaskReassignmentService::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :forbidden
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue TaskReassignmentService::ValidationError => e
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Task reassignment validation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message, details: e.details } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/tasks/:id/submit_explanation
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def submit_explanation
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service = TaskVisibilityService.new(task: @task, user: current_user)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service.submit_explanation!(missed_reason: params[:missed_reason])
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue TaskVisibilityService::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :forbidden
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue TaskVisibilityService::ValidationError => e
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/toggle_visibility
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def toggle_visibility
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service = TaskVisibilityService.new(task: @task, user: current_user)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    visibility = params[:visibility]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    if visibility.present?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
            

                      # Handle visibility parameter (for change_visibility-style calls)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      service.change_visibility!(visibility: visibility)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      # Handle coach_id/visible parameters (for toggle_visibility-style calls)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                      coach_id = params[:coach_id]
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                      visible = params[:visible]
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      unless coach_id.present?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: { message: "coach_id parameter is required" } },
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                               status: :bad_request
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      service.toggle_for_coach!(coach_id: coach_id, visible: visible)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue TaskVisibilityService::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :forbidden
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue TaskVisibilityService::ValidationError => e
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :bad_request
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue TaskVisibilityService::NotFoundError => e
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Not found in toggle_visibility: #{e.message}"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :not_found
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/change_visibility
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def change_visibility
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                    visibility = params[:visibility]
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless %w[visible hidden coaching_only].include?(visibility)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { error: { message: "Invalid visibility setting" } },
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    case visibility
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "visible"
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.make_visible!
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "hidden"
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.make_hidden!
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "coaching_only"
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.make_coaching_only!
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/tasks/:id/add_subtask
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def add_subtask
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    title = params[:title]
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless title.present?
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { error: { message: "Title is required" } }, status: :bad_request
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service = SubtaskManagementService.new(parent_task: @task, user: current_user)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    due_time = parse_iso(params[:due_at])
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    subtask = service.create_subtask!(
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: title,
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                      note: params[:note],
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                      due_at: due_time
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(subtask, current_user: current_user).as_json.merge(parent_task_id: @task.id),
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                           status: :created
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue SubtaskManagementService::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :forbidden
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue SubtaskManagementService::ValidationError => e
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Subtask creation validation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message, details: e.details } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/subtasks/:subtask_id
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def update_subtask
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Note: @task in this context is the subtask being updated
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                    # We need to find the parent task to use the service
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    parent_task = @task.parent_task || Task.find_by(id: @task.parent_task_id)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service = SubtaskManagementService.new(parent_task: parent_task, user: current_user)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service.update_subtask!(subtask: @task, attributes: task_params)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue SubtaskManagementService::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :forbidden
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue SubtaskManagementService::ValidationError => e
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message, details: e.details } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/tasks/:id/subtasks/:subtask_id
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def delete_subtask
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Note: @task in this context is the subtask being deleted
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    parent_task = @task.parent_task || Task.find_by(id: @task.parent_task_id)
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service = SubtaskManagementService.new(parent_task: parent_task, user: current_user)
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    service.delete_subtask!(subtask: @task)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    head :no_content
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue SubtaskManagementService::UnauthorizedError => e
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: e.message } }, status: :forbidden
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/tasks/blocking
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def blocking
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                    @tasks = current_user.owned_lists
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .joins(tasks: :escalation)
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(item_escalations: { blocking_app: true })
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(tasks: { completed_at: nil })
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .includes(:creator, :subtasks)
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: @tasks.map { |task| TaskSerializer.new(task, current_user: current_user).as_json }
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/tasks/awaiting_explanation
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def awaiting_explanation
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    @tasks = Task.joins(:list)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .where(lists: { user_id: current_user.id })
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .awaiting_explanation
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .includes(:creator, :list)
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      tasks: @tasks.map { |task| TaskSerializer.new(task, current_user: current_user).as_json }
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/tasks/overdue
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def overdue
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    @tasks = Task.joins(:list)
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .where(lists: { user_id: current_user.id })
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .overdue
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .includes(:creator, :list, :escalation)
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .order(due_at: :asc)
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                      tasks: @tasks.map { |task| TaskSerializer.new(task, current_user: current_user).as_json }
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
              97
            

            
              
            

                    list_id = params[:list_id]
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
              97
            

            
              
            

                    list_id ||= params[:listId]
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
              97
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 95
                
              
            

                    list_id ||= params.dig(:task, :list_id) if params[:task].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters)
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
              97
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 95
                
              
            

                    list_id ||= params.dig(:task, :listId) if params[:task].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters)
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
              97
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 97
                
              
            

                    list_id ||= params.dig(:list, :id) if params[:list].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters)
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Fallback: use user's first list if no list_id provided
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
              97
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if list_id.blank?
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

                      @list = current_user.owned_lists.first
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      if @list.nil?
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

                        raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, "No list found. Please create a list first or specify a list_id."
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 97
                
              
            

                    else
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
              97
            

            
              
            

                      @list = List.find(list_id)
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check if user has access to this list
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
              95
            

            
              
                
                  else: 90
                
              
                
                  then: 5
                
              
            

                      unless @list.can_view?(current_user)
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

                        nil
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "List not found: User #{current_user.id} tried to access list #{list_id}"
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350.

                    render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :not_found
          
      351.

      356.

      357.

                  def task_params
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle both nested task params and direct params (iOS app)
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
              170
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
            

                    if params[:task].present?
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                      params.require(:task).permit(
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            
              
            

                        :title, :note, :due_at, :priority, :can_be_snoozed, :strict_mode,
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            
              
            

                        :notification_interval_minutes, :requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            
              
            

                        :is_recurring, :recurrence_pattern, :recurrence_interval, :recurrence_time, :recurrence_end_date,
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            
              
            

                        :location_based, :location_latitude, :location_longitude, :location_radius_meters,
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380.

      381.

                        :list_id, :visibility,
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            
              
            

                        { recurrence_days: [] }
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Handle direct params from iOS app - be more permissive to handle parameter pollution
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 168
                
              
            

                      begin
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
              168
            

            
              
            

                        params.permit(
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            
              
            

                          :title, :note, :due_at, :priority, :can_be_snoozed, :strict_mode,
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            
              
            

                          :notification_interval_minutes, :requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            
              
            

                          :is_recurring, :recurrence_pattern, :recurrence_interval, :recurrence_time, :recurrence_end_date,
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            
              
            

                          :location_based, :location_latitude, :location_longitude, :location_radius_meters,
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            
              
            

                          :location_name, :notify_on_arrival, :notify_on_departure,
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            
              
            

                          :list_id, :name, :dueDate, :description, :due_date, :visibility,
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            
              
            

                          { recurrence_days: [] }
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            
              
            

                        )
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue ActionController::UnpermittedParameters => e
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Log but don't fail - this handles parameter pollution gracefully
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.warn "Unpermitted parameters detected: #{e.params.join(', ')}"
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            
              
            

                        params.permit(
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            
              
            

                          :title, :note, :due_at, :priority, :can_be_snoozed, :strict_mode,
          
      401.

                          :notification_interval_minutes, :requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      402.

      403.

      404.

      405.

                          :list_id, :name, :dueDate, :description, :due_date, :visibility,
          
      406.

                          { recurrence_days: [] }
          
      407.

                  def can_access_task?(task)
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user owns the list
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return true if task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user created the task
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return true if task.creator_id == current_user.id
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if user is a member/coach of the list
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return true if task.list.memberships.exists?(user_id: current_user.id)
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            
              
            

                    false
          
      423.

      424.

                  def authorize_task_visibility_change

                  else: 0

      428.

      429.

      430.

                  def parse_iso(date_string)
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                    return nil if date_string.blank?
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    Time.parse(date_string)
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ArgumentError
          
      436.

                    nil
          
      437.

      438.

    439. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def validate_params
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate pagination parameters
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            
              26
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 26
                
              
            

                    if params[:page].present? && params[:page].to_i < 1
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Page must be a positive integer" } },
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            
              26
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 26
                
              
            

                    if params[:per_page].present? && (params[:per_page].to_i < 1 || params[:per_page].to_i > 100)
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Per page must be between 1 and 100" } },
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Validate status filter
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            
              26
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 26
                
              
            

                    if params[:status].present? && !%w[pending completed done overdue].include?(params[:status])
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Invalid status filter" } },
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            
              
            

                             status: :bad_request
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            
              
            

                      nil
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def build_tasks_query(base_query)
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply status filtering
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            
              24
            

            
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
                
                  else: 20
                
              
            

                    if params[:status].present?
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      case params[:status]
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                      when "pending"
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where(status: "pending")
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                      when "completed", "done"
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where(status: "done")
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                      when "overdue"
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                        base_query = base_query.where("due_at < ?", Time.current).where.not(status: "done")
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply list filtering for all_tasks
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            
              24
            

            
              
                
                  then: 10
                
              
                
                  else: 14
                
              
            

                    if params[:list_id].present?
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.where(list_id: params[:list_id])
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Apply sorting - use hash syntax to prevent SQL injection
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                    sort_by = params[:sort_by] || "created_at"
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                    sort_order = params[:sort_order] || "desc"
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Whitelist valid columns and directions
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                    valid_columns = %w[created_at updated_at due_at title]
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                    valid_directions = %w[asc desc]
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                    if valid_columns.include?(sort_by) && valid_directions.include?(sort_order)
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 24
                
              
            

                      # Use hash syntax instead of string interpolation
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.order(sort_by.to_sym => sort_order.to_sym)
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            
              
            

                      base_query = base_query.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                    base_query
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def per_page_limit
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            
              24

                  def sanitize_preferences(preferences)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Recursively sanitize preferences to prevent malicious data
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    case preferences
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when Hash
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                      preferences.transform_values { |v| sanitize_preferences(v) }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    when ActionController::Parameters
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                      # Convert to hash first, then sanitize
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      preferences.permit!.to_h.transform_values { |v| sanitize_preferences(v) }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when Array
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                      preferences.map { |v| sanitize_preferences(v) }
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    when String
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                      # Limit string length but be more permissive for testing
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                      sanitized = preferences.to_s.strip
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      sanitized.length > 5000 ? sanitized[0...5000] : sanitized
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when Numeric
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                      preferences
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when TrueClass, FalseClass
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                      preferences
          
      157.

    158.

      160.

                      # Convert other types to string and sanitize
          
      161.

      162.

    app/controllers/api_failure_app.rb

    66.67% lines covered

    1.

              private
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

              # Helper method to ensure consistent error response structure
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def build_error_response(message, status, details = nil)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                response = {
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                  error: {
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: message,
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: Rack::Utils.status_code(status),
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                    timestamp: Time.current.iso8601
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                response[:error][:details] = details if details.present?
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                response
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

              # Helper method to validate error details
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def validate_error_details(details)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return nil if details.nil?
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                case details
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when Hash, Array, String, Numeric, TrueClass, FalseClass, NilClass
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                  details
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when ActiveModel::Errors
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                  details.as_json
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                  details.to_s
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      276.

      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                render json: metrics_data, status: :ok
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      71.

              def perform_health_checks

              def database_health_check
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
              13
            

            
              
            

                connection = ActiveRecord::Base.connection
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                connection.active?
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                # Test a simple query
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                connection.execute("SELECT 1")
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                duration = ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                  status: "healthy",
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  response_time_ms: duration,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  message: "Database connection active and responsive"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Database health check failed: #{e.message}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  status: "unhealthy",
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  response_time_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  message: e.message,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  error: e.class.name
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115.

      116.
