              def redis_health_check
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use the configured Redis instance
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              12
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                redis = if defined?(Redis.current)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 12
                
              
            

                          Redis.current
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
              12
            

            
              
                
                  then: 12
                
              
            

                elsif defined?(Sidekiq) && Sidekiq.respond_to?(:redis)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                          Sidekiq.redis { |conn| conn }
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                          Redis.new
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                response = redis.ping
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                duration = ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              12
            

            
              
                
                  then: 12
                
              
            

                if response == "PONG"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                    status: "healthy",
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    response_time_ms: duration,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Redis connection active and responsive"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: "unhealthy",
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                    response_time_ms: duration,
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Unexpected Redis response: #{response}"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Redis health check failed: #{e.message}"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "unhealthy",
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  response_time_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  message: e.message,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  error: e.class.name
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155.

              def queue_health_check
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if Sidekiq is available and responsive
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                if defined?(Sidekiq)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 12
                
              
            

                  # Try to get Redis info through Sidekiq
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
              12
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  redis_info = if Sidekiq.respond_to?(:redis_info)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 12
                
              
            

                                 Sidekiq.redis_info
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
              12
            

            
              
                
                  then: 12
                
              
            

                  elsif Sidekiq.respond_to?(:redis)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              24
            

            
              
            

                                 Sidekiq.redis { |conn| conn.info }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                                 nil
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                  queue_size = Sidekiq::Queue.new.size rescue 0
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                  failed_jobs = Sidekiq::DeadSet.new.size rescue 0
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                  duration = ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                    status: "healthy",
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    response_time_ms: duration,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Queue system operational",
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                    details: {
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                      queue_size: queue_size,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                      failed_jobs: failed_jobs,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                      redis_connected: redis_info.present?
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    status: "unhealthy",
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                    response_time_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Sidekiq not available"
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      192.

              rescue => e
          
      193.

                Rails.logger.error "Queue health check failed: #{e.message}"
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "unhealthy",
          
      196.

              def storage_health_check
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if file storage is working
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if Rails.application.config.active_storage.service == :local
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  storage_path = Rails.root.join("storage")
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  if Dir.exist?(storage_path) && File.writable?(storage_path)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                      status: "healthy",
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                      response_time_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                      message: "Local storage accessible and writable"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                      status: "unhealthy",
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                      response_time_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      message: "Local storage not accessible or not writable"
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 4
                
              
            

                  # For cloud storage, we could add specific checks here
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                    status: "healthy",
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                    response_time_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Cloud storage configured (not tested)"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Storage health check failed: #{e.message}"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "unhealthy",
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                  response_time_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      234.

                  message: e.message,
          
      235.

                  error: e.class.name
          
      236.

                }
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def external_apis_health_check
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check external API dependencies
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                checks = {}
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add checks for external APIs your application depends on
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                # Example: APNS, FCM, etc.
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                duration = ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
              4
            

            
              
                
                  then: 4
                
              
            

                if checks.empty?
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                    status: "healthy",
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                    response_time_ms: duration,
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "No external API dependencies configured"
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                  all_healthy = checks.values.all? { |check| check[:status] == "healthy" }
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    status: all_healthy ? "healthy" : "degraded",
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                    response_time_ms: duration,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    message: all_healthy ? "All external APIs operational" : "Some external APIs unavailable",
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                    details: checks
          
      263.

              rescue => e

    267. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268.

              def self.load_configuration
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                config_file = Rails.root.join("config", "application.yml")
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                if File.exist?(config_file)
          
      113.

                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  begin
          
      114.

                    yaml_content = YAML.load_file(config_file, aliases: true)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    config = yaml_content[Rails.env] || yaml_content["default"] || {}
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "Configuration loaded from #{config_file} for environment: #{Rails.env}"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    config
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue Psych::SyntaxError => e
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "YAML syntax error in configuration file: #{e.message}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ConfigurationError, "Invalid YAML syntax in configuration file: #{e.message}"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue => e
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error loading configuration: #{e.message}"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ConfigurationError, "Failed to load configuration: #{e.message}"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Configuration file not found: #{config_file}. Using defaults."
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  {}
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.validate_type(value, type, key_path)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                case type
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :integer
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  unless value.is_a?(Integer) || value.to_s.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ValidationError, "Configuration #{key_path} must be an integer (got #{value.class}: #{value})"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :string
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  unless value.is_a?(String)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ValidationError, "Configuration #{key_path} must be a string (got #{value.class}: #{value})"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :boolean
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  unless [ true, false, "true", "false", 1, 0 ].include?(value)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ValidationError, "Configuration #{key_path} must be a boolean (got #{value.class}: #{value})"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :array
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  unless value.is_a?(Array)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ValidationError, "Configuration #{key_path} must be an array (got #{value.class}: #{value})"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :hash
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  unless value.is_a?(Hash)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise ValidationError, "Configuration #{key_path} must be a hash (got #{value.class}: #{value})"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.parse_env_value(value, type)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                case type
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :integer
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  value.to_i
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :boolean
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  %w[true 1 yes on].include?(value.downcase)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :array
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  value.split(",").map(&:strip)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :hash
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  JSON.parse(value) rescue value
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  value
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.warn "Failed to parse environment value '#{value}' as #{type}: #{e.message}"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                value
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              # Task configuration
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.task_title_max_length
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                get("task.title_max_length", 255, type: :integer)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.task_note_max_length
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                get("task.note_max_length", 1000, type: :integer)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.task_cache_expiry
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                minutes = get("task.cache_expiry_minutes", 5, type: :integer)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                minutes.minutes
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

              # Performance grades
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.performance_grade(completion_rate)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                grades = get("performance.grades", {}, type: :hash)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                # Validate completion rate
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                unless completion_rate.is_a?(Numeric) && completion_rate >= 0 && completion_rate <= 1
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise ValidationError, "Completion rate must be a number between 0 and 1 (got #{completion_rate})"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                case completion_rate
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when grades["a"] then "A"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when grades["b"] then "B"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when grades["c"] then "C"
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                when grades["d"] then "D"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                else "F"
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

              # Rate limiting
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.api_rate_limit
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                get("rate_limits.api.limit", 100, type: :integer)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.api_rate_period
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                value = get("rate_limits.api.period", "1.minute")
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                value.is_a?(String) ? parse_time_period(value) : value
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.auth_rate_limit
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                get("rate_limits.auth.limit", 5, type: :integer)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.auth_rate_period
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                value = get("rate_limits.auth.period", "1.minute")
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                value.is_a?(String) ? parse_time_period(value) : value
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.password_reset_rate_limit
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                get("rate_limits.password_reset.limit", 3, type: :integer)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.password_reset_rate_period
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                value = get("rate_limits.password_reset.period", "1.hour")
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                value.is_a?(String) ? parse_time_period(value) : value
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

              # Time periods
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.recent_activity_period
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                value = get("time_periods.recent_activity", 1.week)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                value.is_a?(String) ? parse_time_period(value) : value
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.upcoming_deadlines_period
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                value = get("time_periods.upcoming_deadlines", 1.week)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                value.is_a?(String) ? parse_time_period(value) : value
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.cache_expiry
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                value = get("time_periods.cache_expiry", 5.minutes)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                value.is_a?(String) ? parse_time_period(value) : value
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

              # Safe time period parsing
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.parse_time_period(period_string)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                case period_string.downcase.strip
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*minutes?$/
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.minutes
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*hours?$/
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.hours
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*days?$/
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.days
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*weeks?$/
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.weeks
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*months?$/
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.months
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*years?$/
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.years
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Fallback to default if parsing fails
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                  1.week
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

              # Database configuration
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.default_page_size
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                get("database.default_page_size", 20, type: :integer)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.max_page_size
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                get("database.max_page_size", 100, type: :integer)
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

              # Notification configuration
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.default_notification_interval
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                get("notifications.default_interval_minutes", 10, type: :integer)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.max_notification_retries
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                get("notifications.max_retries", 3, type: :integer)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

              # Location configuration
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.default_location_radius
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                get("location.default_radius_meters", 100, type: :integer)
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.max_location_radius
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                get("location.max_radius_meters", 10000, type: :integer)
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

              end

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              # Retry on network errors with exponential backoff
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3 do |job, error|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Job #{job.class.name} failed: #{error.message}"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              end

            # frozen_string_literal: true
