              class << self
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def statistics_for_coaching_relationship(rel)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              2
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  rel_id = rel.is_a?(CoachingRelationship) ? rel.id : rel
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  rows = unscoped.where(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, deleted_at: nil)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  totals_completed = rows.sum(:tasks_completed)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  totals_missed    = rows.sum(:tasks_missed)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  totals_overdue   = rows.sum(:tasks_overdue)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  average_rate     = begin
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks = totals_completed + totals_missed
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
              2
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                    total_tasks.zero? ? 0.0 : ((totals_completed.to_f / total_tasks) * 100).round(2)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    total_summaries: rows.count,
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks_completed: totals_completed,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks_missed: totals_missed,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_tasks_overdue: totals_overdue,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                    average_completion_rate: average_rate
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                # Additional analytics methods
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def performance_trends_for_coaching_relationship(rel, days = 30)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  rel_id = rel.is_a?(CoachingRelationship) ? rel.id : rel
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  summaries = unscoped
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                                .where(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, deleted_at: nil)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                                .where("summary_date >= ?", days.days.ago.to_date)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                                .order(:summary_date)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                    daily_completion_rates: summaries.map(&:completion_rate),
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    daily_totals: summaries.map { |s| { date: s.summary_date, total: s.total_tasks } },
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                    weekly_averages: calculate_weekly_averages(summaries),
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                    performance_grade_distribution: calculate_grade_distribution(summaries)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def find_or_create_for_date(rel, date)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  rel_id = rel.is_a?(CoachingRelationship) ? rel.id : rel
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                  find_by(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, summary_date: date.to_date) ||
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                    create!(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, summary_date: date.to_date)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def bulk_create_for_date_range(rel, start_date, end_date)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  rel_id = rel.is_a?(CoachingRelationship) ? rel.id : rel
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                  dates = (start_date.to_date..end_date.to_date).to_a
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                  existing_dates = where(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, summary_date: dates).pluck(:summary_date)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                  new_dates = dates - existing_dates
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                  new_dates.map do |date|
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    create!(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, summary_date: date)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def export_data_for_coaching_relationship(rel, format = :csv)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  rel_id = rel.is_a?(CoachingRelationship) ? rel.id : rel
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                  summaries = unscoped.where(coaching_relationship_id: rel_id, deleted_at: nil).order(:summary_date)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                  case format
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when :csv
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                    export_to_csv(summaries)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when :json
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                    export_to_json(summaries)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                    summaries
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                private
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def calculate_weekly_averages(summaries)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                  summaries.group_by { |s| s.summary_date.beginning_of_week }
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                           .transform_values { |week_summaries|
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                             week_summaries.map(&:completion_rate).sum / week_summaries.size
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                           }
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def calculate_grade_distribution(summaries)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                  grades = summaries.map(&:performance_grade)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                  grades.tally
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def export_to_csv(summaries)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                  require "csv"
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                  CSV.generate do |csv|
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                    csv << %w[Date Tasks_Completed Tasks_Missed Tasks_Overdue Completion_Rate Performance_Grade]
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                    summaries.each do |summary|
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                      csv << [
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                        summary.summary_date,
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

                        summary.tasks_completed,
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                        summary.tasks_missed,
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                        summary.tasks_overdue,
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                        summary.completion_rate,
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                        summary.performance_grade
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                      ]
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      288.

                  then: 1
                
              
            

                return "offline" unless active

              def role_for(user)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              176
            

            
              
                
                  then: 116
                
              
                
                  else: 60
                
              
            

                return "owner" if self.user == user

              def can_edit?(user)

                list_shares.create!(

      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121.

      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122.

              # Task statistics and activity methods
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def task_count
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                tasks.count
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def completed_task_count
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
              6
            

            
              
            

                tasks.where(status: :done).count
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def completion_rate
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              3
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                return 0.0 if task_count.zero?
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                (completed_task_count.to_f / task_count * 100).round(2)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def overdue_task_count
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                tasks.where(status: :pending).where("due_at < ?", Time.current).count
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def recent_activity(limit = 10)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                tasks.order(created_at: :desc).limit(limit)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def summary
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  id: id,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  name: name,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  description: description,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  task_count: task_count,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_task_count: completed_task_count,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  completion_rate: completion_rate
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def statistics
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                total = task_count
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                completed = completed_task_count
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                pending = tasks.where(status: :pending).count
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                overdue = overdue_task_count
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  total_tasks: total,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed_tasks: completed,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                  pending_tasks: pending,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  overdue_tasks: overdue,
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
              2
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                  completion_rate: total.zero? ? 0.0 : (completed.to_f / total * 100).round(2)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219.

              # Access checks
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def accessible_by?(user)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
              41
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 41
                
              
            

                return false if user.nil?
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
              41
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 41
                
              
            

                return false if deleted?
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
              41
            

            
              
                
                  then: 20
                
              
                
                  else: 21
                
              
            

                return true if user_id == user.id
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
              21
            

            
              
                
                  then: 10
                
              
                
                  else: 11
                
              
            

                return true if list_shares.where(user: user, status: "accepted").exists?
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
              11
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 10
                
              
            

                return true if memberships.where(user: user).exists?
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

              # Coaching helpers
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def coach?(user)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
              4
            

            
              
            

                coaches.include?(user) ||
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                  memberships.exists?(user: user, role: "coach") ||
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                  list_shares.exists?(user: user, role: "coach", status: "accepted") ||
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.role == "coach"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237.

    96.3% lines covered

    70.83% branches covered

            class SavedLocation < ApplicationRecord
          
      2.

              1
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :user

      4.

              # Validations
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :name, presence: true, length: { maximum: 255 }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :latitude,
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                        presence: true,
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                        numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: -90, less_than_or_equal_to: 90 },

    9. 
            
              298

    10. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :longitude,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                        presence: true,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                        numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: -180, less_than_or_equal_to: 180 },
          
      13.

                  2 * 6371000 * ASIN(

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54.

      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      COS(RADIANS(latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(?)) *
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                      POWER(SIN(RADIANS((? - longitude)/2)), 2)
          
      57.

    62.

              # Great-circle distance in meters (Haversine)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_distance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
              15
            

            
              
            

                lat1 = lat1.to_f; lon1 = lon1.to_f; lat2 = lat2.to_f; lon2 = lon2.to_f
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              15
            

            
              
                
                  then: 6
                
              
                
                  else: 9
                
              
            

                return 0.0 if lat1 == lat2 && lon1 == lon2
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                r = 6_371_008.8 # meters (more accurate Earth radius)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                dlat = to_rad(lat2 - lat1)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                dlon = to_rad(lon2 - lon1)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                a = Math.sin(dlat / 2)**2 +
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.cos(to_rad(lat1)) * Math.cos(to_rad(lat2)) * Math.sin(dlon / 2)**2
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                c = 2 * Math.asin(Math.sqrt(a))
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                r * c
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def to_rad(deg)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              36
            

            
              
            

                deg.to_f * Math::PI / 180.0
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def radius_meters_presence_after_defaults
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                # This runs after the before_validation callback that sets defaults
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                # So if radius_meters is still nil here, it's an error
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
              149
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 148
                
              
            

                if radius_meters.nil?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:radius_meters, "can't be blank")
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      177.

    80.79% lines covered

            class Task < ApplicationRecord

              # Associations

              belongs_to :parent_task, class_name: "Task", optional: true

              1
            

            
              
            

              def minutes_overdue
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return 0 unless overdue?

              def editable_by?(user)    = user.present? && list.can_edit?(user)

              def visible_to?(user)

                when "coaching_only"

                else

              def prevent_circular_subtask_relationship

              def at_location?(saved_location, lat = nil, lon = nil)

                # Use provided coordinates or get from current location

              def calculate_distance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                # Haversine formula - returns distance in meters
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                earth_radius = 6371000 # meters
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                lat1_rad = lat1 * Math::PI / 180
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                lat2_rad = lat2 * Math::PI / 180
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                delta_lat = (lat2 - lat1) * Math::PI / 180
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                delta_lon = (lon2 - lon1) * Math::PI / 180
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                a = Math.sin(delta_lat / 2) ** 2 +
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.cos(lat1_rad) * Math.cos(lat2_rad) *
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.sin(delta_lon / 2) ** 2
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                c = 2 * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1 - a))
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                earth_radius * c
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      178.

              def invitee?(rel, user)

              def queue_notification(event, relationship_id)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

              def enqueue_notification(event)

    52. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1

      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55.

                else
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

      58.

              def build_series(group_by, limit)

              12

                when "day"

    128.

    129. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "week"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  build_weekly_series(limit)

                  when: 0

      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      134.

                  build_daily_series(limit)
          
      135.

              def build_daily_series(limit)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                completed_tasks = user_tasks.completed
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where(completed_at: @window[:from]..@window[:to])
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .group("DATE(completed_at)")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .count
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                (@window[:from].to_date..@window[:to].to_date)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  .last(limit)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  .map do |date|
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              360
            

            
              
            

                      period: date.iso8601,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      completed: completed_tasks[date] || 0
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def build_weekly_series(limit)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_tasks = user_tasks.completed
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where(completed_at: @window[:from]..@window[:to])
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .group("DATE_TRUNC('week', completed_at)")
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .count
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                weeks = []
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                current_week = @window[:from].beginning_of_week
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                end_week = @window[:to].end_of_week
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
                
                  body: 0
                
              
            

                while current_week <= end_week && weeks.length < limit
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  week_start = current_week.to_date
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  week_end = (current_week + 6.days).to_date
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  weeks << {
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                    period: "#{week_start.iso8601}/#{week_end.iso8601}",
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed: completed_tasks[current_week] || 0
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_week += 1.week
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                weeks
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def build_monthly_series(limit)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                completed_tasks = user_tasks.completed
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where(completed_at: @window[:from]..@window[:to])
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .group("DATE_TRUNC('month', completed_at)")
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .count
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                months = []
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                current_month = @window[:from].beginning_of_month
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                end_month = @window[:to].end_of_month
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
                
                  body: 0
                
              
            

                while current_month <= end_month && months.length < limit
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  months << {
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    period: current_month.strftime("%Y-%m"),
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                    completed: completed_tasks[current_month] || 0
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_month = current_month.next_month
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                months
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

              # User dashboard methods
          
      202.

              1
            

            
              
            

              def blocking_tasks_count
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                ItemEscalation.joins(task: { list: :user })
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where(lists: { user_id: @user.id })
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where(escalation_level: "blocking", blocking_app: true)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                              .count
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      208.

              1
            

            
              
            

              def awaiting_explanation_count
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                user_tasks.where(requires_explanation_if_missed: true)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                          .where("due_at < ?", Time.current)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                          .where(status: :pending)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                          .count
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214.

      215.

              def coaches_count
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                CoachingRelationship.where(client_id: @user.id, status: "active").count
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def completion_rate_this_week
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                week_start = Time.current.beginning_of_week
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                week_tasks = user_tasks.where("tasks.created_at >= ?", week_start)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                week_total = week_tasks.count
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
              23
            

            
              
                
                  then: 14
                
              
                
                  else: 9
                
              
            

                return 0.0 if week_total.zero?
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                week_completed = week_tasks.completed.count
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                (week_completed.to_f / week_total * 100).round(1)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def recent_activity
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                TaskEvent.joins(task: { list: :user })
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                         .includes(task: :list)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                         .where(lists: { user_id: @user.id })
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                         .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                         .limit(10)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                         .map do |event|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
              12
            

            
              
            

                    id: event.id,
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                    task_title: event.task.title,
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                    action: event.event_type,
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    occurred_at: event.created_at.iso8601
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def upcoming_deadlines
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              23
            

            
              
            

                user_tasks.includes(:list)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                          .where(status: :pending)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                          .where("due_at > ?", Time.current)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                          .order(due_at: :asc)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                          .limit(10)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                          .map do |task|
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
              6
            

            
              
            

                    id: task.id,
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: task.title,
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                    due_at: task.due_at.iso8601,
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                    list_name: task.list.name,
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
              6
            

            
              
            

                    days_until_due: ((task.due_at - Time.current) / 1.day).round(1)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

              # Coach dashboard methods

      276.

                CoachingRelationship.where(coach_id: @user.id, status: "active").count

              def recent_client_activity
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                client_ids = CoachingRelationship.where(coach_id: @user.id, status: "active").pluck(:client_id)
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                TaskEvent.joins(task: { list: :user })
          
      290.

      295.

              # Stats methods
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def average_completion_time
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                completed = user_tasks.completed.where.not(completed_at: nil)
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
              10
            

            
              
                
                  then: 5
                
              
                
                  else: 5
                
              
            

                return 0.0 if completed.count.zero?
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                total_time = completed.sum("EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tasks.completed_at - tasks.created_at))")
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                (total_time.to_f / completed.count / 3600).round(1) # Convert to hours
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def tasks_by_priority
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                # Priority field doesn't exist in current schema, return placeholder counts
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                # Tasks can be categorized by due date proximity instead
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                now = Time.current
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                urgent = user_tasks.where("due_at < ?", now + 1.day).count
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                high = user_tasks.where("due_at >= ? AND due_at < ?", now + 1.day, now + 3.days).count
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                medium = user_tasks.where("due_at >= ? AND due_at < ?", now + 3.days, now + 7.days).count
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                low = user_tasks.where("due_at >= ?", now + 7.days).count
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                  urgent: urgent,
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

                  high: high,
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                  medium: medium,
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                  low: low
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def total_client_tasks
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                client_ids = CoachingRelationship.where(coach_id: @user.id, status: "active").pluck(:client_id)
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                Task.joins(:list).where(lists: { user_id: client_ids }).count
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def completed_client_tasks
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                client_ids = CoachingRelationship.where(coach_id: @user.id, status: "active").pluck(:client_id)
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                Task.joins(:list).where(lists: { user_id: client_ids }).completed.count
          
      339.
