            class DailySummaryWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :default, retry: 2
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                current_hour = Time.current.hour
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Checking for summaries to send at hour #{current_hour}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find relationships that want daily summaries at this hour
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                CoachingRelationship.active
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where(send_daily_summary: true)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where.not(daily_summary_time: nil)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .find_each do |relationship|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  summary_hour = relationship.daily_summary_time.hour
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if it's time to send (within this hour)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  if current_hour == summary_hour
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    process_daily_summary(relationship)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Completed daily summary check"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              def process_daily_summary(relationship)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                today = Date.current
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if already sent today
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                existing_summary = relationship.daily_summaries.find_by(summary_date: today)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                if existing_summary&.sent?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Summary already sent for relationship ##{relationship.id} on #{today}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Generating summary for relationship ##{relationship.id}"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  relationship.generate_daily_summary!(today)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Successfully sent summary for relationship ##{relationship.id}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "[DailySummaryWorker] Error generating summary for relationship ##{relationship.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      50.

            class ItemEscalationWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :critical, retry: 3
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[ItemEscalationWorker] Starting escalation check at #{Time.current}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find all overdue tasks that can't be snoozed
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                overdue_tasks = Task.overdue
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where(can_be_snoozed: false)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .includes(:escalation, :list, :creator)

    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                overdue_tasks.find_each do |task|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  process_task_escalation(task)

    18. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      19.

                Rails.logger.info "[ItemEscalationWorker] Completed escalation check"

      22.

              private

              def process_task_escalation(task)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                escalation = task.escalation || task.create_escalation!
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate time since last notification
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                time_since_last = if escalation.last_notification_at
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                                    (Time.current - escalation.last_notification_at) / 60.0
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                                    999 # Force notification if never sent
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if it's time to send another notification
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                if time_since_last >= task.notification_interval_minutes
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[ItemEscalationWorker] Escalating task ##{task.id}: '#{task.title}'"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Increment notification count and update escalation level
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation.increment!(:notification_count)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation.update!(last_notification_at: Time.current)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Mark as overdue if not already
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  if escalation.became_overdue_at.nil?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    escalation.update!(became_overdue_at: Time.current)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check and update escalation level
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  check_escalation_level(task, escalation)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Send notification
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.send_reminder(task, escalation.escalation_level)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if we should notify coaches (at critical level)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  if escalation.escalation_level == "critical" && !escalation.coaches_notified?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    escalation.update!(coaches_notified: true, coaches_notified_at: Time.current)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    NotificationService.alert_coaches_of_overdue(task)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if app should be blocked
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  if task.should_block_app? && !escalation.blocking_app?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "[ItemEscalationWorker] Blocking app for task ##{task.id}"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    start_blocking_app(task, escalation)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[ItemEscalationWorker] Error processing task ##{task.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

              def check_escalation_level(task, escalation)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                minutes_overdue = task.minutes_overdue
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                new_level = case task.priority
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                when 3 # Urgent
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                              if minutes_overdue > 120
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                                "blocking"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 60
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                                "critical"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 30
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                                "warning"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                                "normal"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                when 2 # High
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                              if minutes_overdue > 240
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                                "blocking"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 120
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                                "critical"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 60
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                                "warning"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                                "normal"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                else # Medium/Low
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                              if minutes_overdue > 240
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                                "critical"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 120
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                                "warning"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                                "normal"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                if new_level != escalation.escalation_level
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[ItemEscalationWorker] Task ##{task.id} escalated from #{escalation.escalation_level} to #{new_level}"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation.update!(escalation_level: new_level)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

              def start_blocking_app(task, escalation)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                escalation.update!(
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  blocking_app: true,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  blocking_started_at: Time.current
          
      116.

                )

    117.

                # Send critical blocking notification
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                NotificationService.app_blocking_started(task)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                # Notify coaches immediately
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                unless escalation.coaches_notified?
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation.update!(coaches_notified: true, coaches_notified_at: Time.current)
          
      124.

                  NotificationService.alert_coaches_of_overdue(task)

            class LocationCheckWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :critical, retry: 1
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(user_id, latitude, longitude, accuracy = nil)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                user = User.find(user_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] Checking location for user ##{user_id} at (#{latitude}, #{longitude})"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Save location record
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                user.user_locations.create!(
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  latitude: latitude,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  longitude: longitude,
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  accuracy: accuracy,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  recorded_at: Time.current
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find location-based tasks for this user
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                location_tasks = Task.joins(:list)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(lists: { user_id: user.id })
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(location_based: true)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(completed_at: nil)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] Found #{location_tasks.count} location-based tasks"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                location_tasks.find_each do |task|
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  check_task_location(task, latitude, longitude, user)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] User ##{user_id} not found"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] Error: #{e.message}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      39.

      40.

              def check_task_location(task, user_lat, user_lng, user)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate distance from user to task location
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                distance = Geocoder::Calculations.distance_between(
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ task.location_latitude, task.location_longitude ],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ user_lat, user_lng ],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  units: :km
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                ) * 1000 # Convert to meters
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                is_within = distance <= task.location_radius_meters
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get user's previous location to determine if arriving or departing
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                previous_location = user.user_locations
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where("recorded_at < ?", 5.minutes.ago)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .order(recorded_at: :desc)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .first
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                was_within = if previous_location
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                               prev_distance = Geocoder::Calculations.distance_between(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                                 [ task.location_latitude, task.location_longitude ],
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                                 [ previous_location.latitude, previous_location.longitude ],
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                                 units: :km
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                               ) * 1000
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                               prev_distance <= task.location_radius_meters
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                               false
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                # Determine event
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                if is_within && !was_within && task.notify_on_arrival?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User just arrived at location
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] User arrived at location for task ##{task.id}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.location_based_reminder(task, :arrival)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif !is_within && was_within && task.notify_on_departure?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User just left location
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] User departed from location for task ##{task.id}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.location_based_reminder(task, :departure)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] Error checking task ##{task.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      83.

            class RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :default, retry: 2
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Starting recurring task generation at #{Time.current}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find all recurring templates
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                templates = Task.templates.includes(:list, :recurring_instances)

    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12.

    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                templates.find_each do |template|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  generate_instances_for_template(template)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Completed recurring task generation"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20.

              private

      23.

              def generate_instances_for_template(template)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate when the next instance should be due
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                next_due = template.calculate_next_due_date
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                return unless next_due
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if we've reached the end date
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                if template.recurrence_end_date.present? && next_due > template.recurrence_end_date
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Template ##{template.id} has reached end date"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate instances for the next 7 days
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                instances_to_generate = []
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                current_date = next_due
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                7.times do
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  break if template.recurrence_end_date.present? && current_date > template.recurrence_end_date
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if instance already exists for this date
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  existing = template.recurring_instances.find_by(
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    "DATE(due_at) = ?", current_date.to_date
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  if existing.nil?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    instances_to_generate << current_date
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Calculate next date based on pattern
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_date = advance_date(current_date, template)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create the instances
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                instances_to_generate.each do |due_date|
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  create_instance(template, due_date)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                if instances_to_generate.any?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Generated #{instances_to_generate.count} instances for template ##{template.id}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Error processing template ##{template.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

              def create_instance(template, due_date)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                # Set the time component if specified
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                if template.recurrence_time.present?
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  due_date = due_date.change(
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    hour: template.recurrence_time.hour,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                    min: template.recurrence_time.min
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                instance = template.recurring_instances.create!(
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  list: template.list,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  creator: template.creator,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  title: template.title,

                  description: template.description,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  due_at: due_date,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  priority: template.priority,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_be_snoozed: template.can_be_snoozed,
          
      86.

      87.

      89.

                  notify_on_departure: template.notify_on_departure
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[RecurringTaskGeneratorWorker] Created instance ##{instance.id} for template ##{template.id}, due #{due_date}"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                # Notify the user about the new task
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                NotificationService.recurring_task_generated(instance)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                instance

      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              def advance_date(date, template)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                case template.recurrence_pattern
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                when "daily"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + template.recurrence_interval.days
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                when "weekly"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date = date + template.recurrence_interval.weeks
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  # If specific days are set, advance to next matching day
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  if template.recurrence_days.present?
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    while !template.recurrence_days.include?(next_date.wday)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      next_date += 1.day
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                when "monthly"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + template.recurrence_interval.months
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                when "custom"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + template.recurrence_interval.days
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  date + 1.day
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      129.

    app/workers/task_completion_handler_worker.rb

    1. 
            

            
              
            

            class TaskCompletionHandlerWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :default, retry: 2
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(task_id)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                task = Task.find(task_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Processing completion for task ##{task_id}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Clear escalation
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.escalation
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  task.escalation.clear!
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Cleared escalation for task ##{task_id}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # Notify coaches
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.created_by_coach?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.task_completed(task)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Notified coaches of completion"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate next recurring instance if applicable
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.recurring_template.present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_instance = task.recurring_template.generate_next_instance
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  if next_instance
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Generated next recurring instance ##{next_instance.id}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if parent task should be completed (all subtasks done)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.parent_task_id.present?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  parent = task.parent_task
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  if parent.all_subtasks_completed? && parent.completed_at.nil?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    parent.complete!
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Auto-completed parent task ##{parent.id}"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Task ##{task_id} not found"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[TaskCompletionHandlerWorker] Error: #{e.message}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                raise # Retry
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      48.

              def perform(user_id, message = "Test notification")
          
      7.

                user = User.find(user_id)

      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                NotificationService.send_test_notification(user, message)
          
      12.
